languages.text: Чтобы провести запоминающуюся церемонию, необходимо обсудить ее подготовку с Высоким фактотумом на мостике.
In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.
languages.original_text: Чтобы провести запоминающуюся церемонию, необходимо обсудить ее подготовку с Высоким фактотумом на мостике.

traits.locale_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

languages.text: Para celebrar una ceremonia verdaderamente memorable, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería hablar de los preparativos con el Sumo Factótum en el puente.
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Para celebrar una ceremonia verdaderamente memorable, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería hablar de los preparativos con el Sumo Factótum en el puente.

languages.text: 思い出に残るセレモニーを開催するために、ロード・キャプテンは橋でハイ・ファクトタムと準備について話し合う必要がある。
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 思い出に残るセレモニーを開催するために、ロード・キャプテンは橋でハイ・ファクトタムと準備について話し合う必要がある。

languages.text: 为了举办一场令人难忘的宴会，行商浪人应当前往舰桥，与高阶顾问讨论准备工作。
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 为了举办一场令人难忘的宴会，行商浪人应当前往舰桥，与高阶顾问讨论准备工作。

languages.text: Für eine wahrhaft denkwürdige Zeremonie sollte der Lord Captain die Vorbereitungen mit dem Hoch-Faktotum auf der Brücke besprechen.
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Für eine wahrhaft denkwürdige Zeremonie sollte der Lord Captain die Vorbereitungen mit dem Hoch-Faktotum auf der Brücke besprechen.

languages.text: Pour organiser une cérémonie propre à marquer les esprits, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit discuter des préparatifs avec le haut factotum, sur la passerelle.
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Pour organiser une cérémonie propre à marquer les esprits, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit discuter des préparatifs avec le haut factotum, sur la passerelle.

languages.text: Gerçekten hafızalara kazınacak bir törene ev sahipliği yapmak için Lord Kaptan'ın Arşıkâhya ile köprüde hazırlıkları konuşması gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: In order to host a truly memorable ceremony, the Lord Captain should discuss the preparations with the High Factotum on the bridge.
